title: It's A 10 + Keratin Leave-In Conditioner 10 oz.
description: - This leave-in conditioner forms a protective film across the hair, automatically bonding keratin proteins to fully condition hair inside and out. - Closes and seals the cuticles, prolongs keratin treatment results and protects hair against heat, sun and pollution. - Untangles strands, eliminates static, and leaves hair shiny, sleek, frizz-free.

title: It's A 10 Miracle Oil Plus Keratin for Unisex, 3 Ounce
description: It's a 10® Miracle Oil Plus Keratin.

title: It's A 10 Miracle Shampoo Plus Keratin, 33.8 Fluid Ounce
description: Sulfate free. Paraben free. Keratin protein infused. Prevents breakage. Preserves hair color. Protects from sun damage. Protects from thermal styling.

title: Freetress Equal Lace Front Deep Invisible Part Pre-Cut Wig - BENTLY (#OMFIRERED)
description:
FREE TRESS Equal Lace Front Deep Invisible Part - BENTLY
- Pre-cut Lace
- Deep Invisible Part
- Curling iron safe up to 400F
- Color Shown: OM27/30/613

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS
QUICK STULE IN A MINUTE! NO GLUE! NO TAPE! NECESSARY
STEP 1 Braid hair in cornrow or wrap to secure.
STEP 2 Trim lace according to hairline.
STEP 3 Secure lace front using hair pins.
STEP 4 Style as you desire.
OPTION A. USING LACE FRONT DOUBLE SIDED TAPE
*Repeat STEP 1 & STEP 2
STEP 3 Apply double sided tape under the lace to secure.
STEP 4 Style as you desire.
OPTION B. USING LACE FRONT GLUE
*Repeat STEP 1 & STEP 2
STEP 3 Apply glue on skin surface to secure lace front
STEP 4 Style as you desire.

REMOVING ADHESIVE
STEP 1 Apply remover around the lace thoroughly.
SETP 2 Gently remove the lace when it softens.

CARING INSTRUCTION
*Use lace adhesive remover to thoroughly remove the adhesive and oils from the lace.
*Store your lace front wig on a wig stand or mannequin head or stuff with paper or towel to maintain its shape.
*Refrain from the use of heavy oils or pomades.
*To freshen up the wig, mist with water and shake out the curls.

WASHING YOUR WIG
Since this wig is designed using synthetic fibers, care must be taken to avoid tangling or ruining the curl pattern. Follow these instructions for best results.
1. Do not totally immerse your wig into water. Mist the hair with a spray bottle to dampen the hairs.
2. Apply tour shampoo to your hands fist then run your fingers through the wig using a vertical motion pulling the shampoo out through the ends of the hair.
3. Rinse the shampoo using a spray bottle or spray fhose.
4. Use a towel to blot out the excess water.
5. Shake out the curls.
6. Allow the wig to air dry on a wig stand or a mannequin head.

title: Bel Essence All-Natural Anti-Wrinkle Treatment - Intensive Anti Aging, Facial Lift Skin Care Formula - 1.5oz
description: Your health relies on the right nutrition, so does the health of your skin!Bel Essence gives you what nature intended and combines oils with beneficial properties to maximize your results in a luxurious cream. This all natural cream contains a mix of nine oils:Avocado, Grapeseed, Sesame, Almond, Argan, Shea, Coconut, Meadowfoam Seed and Kukui oils.Most skin care companies who promote their "natural" products take plants apart and recombine chemicals to create the benefits that occur naturally in plant oils. Natural plant oils contain important vitamins, fatty acids and anti-oxidants that help your skin repair, rejuvenate and retain its youthful glow.Avocado and Argan oilsare rich in Vitamin E, a powerful anti-oxidant that decelerates the effects of aging, and essential proteins and fatty acids necessary for collagen and elastin production to firm and tighten skin. These two oils also create a barrier that keeps moisture in the skin, preserving the dewy look you had when you were younger.Sesame, Grapeseed and Almond oilscontain Vitamins A (retinol), B and E which help rejuvenate skin, encourage the production of collagen and elastin, and reduce dark eye circles.Shea and Coconut oilsare powerful emollients, heavily moisturizing the skin and reversing damage from scars, burns and sun.Together, these oils will help skin regain its natural moisture balance and reverse the effects of aging.Bel Essence oils give your skin an instant boost in softness and suppleness,and with regular use will reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles as well as restore your skin's youthful glow.

title: Infiniti Professional Nano Tourmaline Ceramic Curling Iron, 1 1/2-Inch
Revlon RV544PKF 1875W Tourmaline Ionic Ceramic Dryer
description: Revlon 1875 Watt Tourmaline Ionic Lightweight Dryer feature Tourmaline Ionic Technology for ultimate shine, volume, and healthier looking styles. This dryer features an ion indicator light, separate heat and speed rocker switches, 2 heat/2 speed settings, cold shot button, hinged endcap, anti-skid bumpers, and concentrator and finger diffuser attachments. This ultra lightweight design is 25% lighter than your average dryer and has a sleek and upscale spray finish. This unit is super quiet and fast drying.

title: Olay Professional Pro-X Advanced Cleansing System Set
description: Designed by a team of dermatologists along with Olay, the Advanced Cleansing System is as effective as a system sold by skin professionals for nearly 00.* Professionally and clinically designed to cleanse 6 times better**, the Pro-X Advanced Cleansing System also sets your skin up for supersonic anti-aging moisturization.

title: As I Am Coconut Cowash Cleansing Conditioner, 16 Ounce
description: This light no suds conditioning cream gently removes residue including all of the things you've used to style and maintain your coils and curls. Now it's time for a sparkling new beginning. This cowash is different from any other because it contains a special blend of natural ingredients that work to promote healthy hair growth from the follicular level.

title: BEAUTYOILS.CO Rosehip Seed Oil - 100% Pure (2 fl oz)
description:
Naturally rich in linoleic and linolenic acids as well as vitamins A and C, BEAUTYOILS.CO 100% Pure Rosehip Seed Oil is renowned for its benefits on the skin.  This highly-prized oil is known for helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, benefitting mature, aging skin, and rehydrating severely dry skin. BEAUTYOILS.CO Rosehip Seed Oil is cold pressed to ensure freshness and quality. (Not recommended for active acne.  Use patch test before applying around eye area.)
Ingredients: 100% Rosehip Seed Oil (Rosa Moschata).
